General.Name: Bingo Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Bingo Software Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of cloud computing products in China. The company offers BingoCloudOS, an infrastructure cloud platform solution; BingoFuse, a cloud application support platform; BingoLink, a listener enterprise collaboration platform; BingoInsight, a data lake management platform; and BingoCMP, a multi-cloud operation and maintenance management platform. It serves government, public security, telecommunications, rail transit, automobiles, finance, and education industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
